Name: The Palace of Versailles
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur
Instructions: SLAP basil to express oils. STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Review: Rich blackberry flavours are balanced by white wine acidity with cognac providing the base spirit and flavours. Very faint basil notes add complexity.
History: Adapted from a 2015 recipe by Jake Goldstein at The Plotting Parlour, Brighton, England.
